author: Frost Proman
comment: Needs to have options, or location based weather updates. Currently no idea where or which city the weather is based off of. It always seems to be 32°

author: Pete Smith
comment: Really love how the design integrates the black bar on my moto360 but where is the weather info coming from? How often is it updated? It seems wildly innacurate or only updating every 6 hours but then I wouldn't know since there are no options! Would buy this app of these basic features were added. The option to select GPS or town or city and set the refresh interval at least are needed.
title: Good design, where are the options?

author: John Stitzer
comment: The weather is always wrong. Wish I hadn't purchased this. I wish we could also change the opacity of the white circle so you could see more of the beautiful background pictures I paid for.
title: Great design, crappy mechanics.

comment: Needs to be better optimized for square watches. In ambient mode, the letters are so faint and thin it's almost impossible to see them.
title: Good idea, bad execution.

author: Lewis Charlton
comment: Nice watch face but doesn't work in ambient mode also the phone widget is 1 minute slow. I would upgrade to paid version if you could customise battery bar colour, circle colour and select your own picture as background.
title: Nice

author: Abdul Nasim
comment: I wish it had a feature where you enter your city for weather. Or even better if it could integrate with yahoo weather. The weather surely isn't of my location as of now and no way to force update weather. When these are fixed 5 star 🌟edit: I'm sure the weather isn't for my city.
title: Paid for the app but

author: Jackson Neary
comment: The weather just says 0°. No other complaints except that the weather is never correct. Please fix.
title: Weather issue

author: A Karim Siddiqui
comment: I find it very disturbing that the widget for phone does not show correct battery percentage of my watch!

author: Dan Fedida
comment: Very nice.  The phone widget doesn't support 24h mode it seems. Any chance of fixing this?

author: Diego Herranz
comment: It's good, but please, it should allow solid colours as background. Thanks!
title: Black background please

author: Rob Crowe
comment: Please fix ambient mode and would be good to add custom photos
title: Love the look and how clean it is.

author: IDLE 0095
comment: Needs backgrounds that change with the weather.  More opti.ons
title: Backgrounds

author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: Please fix the temperature says 0

author: Маръюш Сымкув
comment: no 24 hour mode and no settings

author: Scott Blechman
comment: Big fan of the design, it's great to show off how the watch can look. Inaccurate weather keeps me from using it regularly. App needs ability to enter location and/or better reporting for user's location. Would be a daily watch face otherwise.
title: Elegant, but needs improvement

author: Levi Edwards
comment: This is one if the most elegant 360 watch faces available, however it could be improved In a few obvious ways. The ability to view cards was recently added and works very well. Ambient mode could use a little tweaking as letters and icons are left transparently on the face and takes away from the elegant design. No notifications on ambient mode might be nice, Im sure the developers will decide the best way to deal with ambient mode. Overall this watch face is very impressive. Worth the money in my opinion.
title: Elegant but needs improvement

author: Ben Walker
comment: Looks really good but the weather is always wrong. Not sure if it thinks I am somewhere else?

author: Chuck Daly
comment: Why does this not show up in the android wear app?

author: Ricky Neil
comment: I love the Google now/material design look of the watch face itself. The backgrounds remind me of the faces first featured in the moto 360 teasers! The only problem that I have is the look of the cards in the ambient display mode. The app is new and I don't doubt we will see many improvements in the future!
title: My favorite Moto 360 watch face

author: Brent Gairy
comment: This is my favorite watch face by far for my Moto 360, but the weather forecasts are consistently wrong. I don't know if weather isn't being updated fast enough, or if its using the wrong location data. Lastly, battery optimizations would be useful.  Update:   The developer has been very helpful and cleared up questions I had with the weather functionality.

reply.author: Xlythe
reply.content:
Weather updates are every 3hrs for the free version, and every hour for the paid version.

Does it noticeably drain battery?

title: So much promise...

author: Jacob Seifert
comment: How about custom backgrounds (for the pro version)?

author: Adam A
comment: Can you make a square version? And the weather doesn't work
title: Square

author: natalie bourdakos
comment: It's very simple and elegant! I just love it!!
title: Awesome!

author: Angga Kramadibrata
comment: Simple and elegant

reply.author: Xlythe
reply.content: We realized it didn't work on the watch soon after we released it, it will be fixed on the next update :) please let us know if you find any other bugs

author: Alessio Pellegrino
comment: The app has no actual features or buttons to toggle except choose your background picture that isn't visible anyway and buy our app. Not to mention the stupid weather doesn't even work it shows the wrong weather all the time and I have no idea what that on/off toggle is at the top right of the app.
title: Unintuitive

author: Amine Bashir
comment: I bought the pro version and would like to see the option to add our own photos in the background. Other than that the face is great!

reply.author: Xlythe
reply.content: we are currently working on this feature, but it may be part of pro

title: Great Face but!

author: Charles Adoki
comment: Has an almost 3D look to it and hides the missing slice at the bottom.
title: Looks good

author: Oliverestaloco Ortega
comment: Can we add our photo or color?

reply.author: Xlythe
reply.content: we are currently working on this feature, but it may be part of pro

title: Awesome

author: M Martin
comment: Great concept and execution!!!
title: Awesome

author: Mikey Johnson
comment: I could make a better watch face for free. In fact, I have.
title: Waste of time.

author: Benjamin Pavel
comment: The watchface is gorgeous and beautiful but the font is too small to read on my LG G Watch, very limited customization like for example custom background, changing the color of circle, font, more weather options (set preferred location like my home if I'm travelling)  and maybe even  some sweet animation when you tturn on your watch like Pujie has. :)
title: Needs more optimization!

author: Martin Reinders
comment: celcius and 24h option please...

author: Brenda Bourdakos
comment: Love it!!!
